column1: #Text=Aang says : " I ca n't believe they would leave me . "
#Text=Messenger says : " I 'm looking for Bato of the Water Tribe . "
#Text=Messenger says : " Make sure he gets this ! "
#Text=Aang says : " It 's the map to Sokka and Katara 's dad ! "
#Text=" Aang says : " Yup , but now I 'm back .
#Text=Sure could go for some delicious sea prunes !
